channel.title: Valeria Dubkovskaya on Allwellbeing
channel.description: Recent content in Valeria Dubkovskaya on Allwellbeing

item.title: “This is very, very bad for the crypto industry.” Who will be dragged to the bottom by the collapse of FTX
item.description: The echoes of the powerful collapse of FTX are still being felt in the crypto industry. On Monday, the value of digital currencies fell again as the market situation worsened over the weekend. Some in the industry have said that the fall of FTX was “Lehman’s moment”, drawing parallels to the collapse of the investment bank in 2008, which was the starting point of the global crisis. The founder of Binance agreed with this metaphor, saying that comparing the current turmoil in the cryptocurrency market with the 2008 global financial crisis is an exact analogy.
